pr_title: DevMojo invoking other goals should filter out goal params that aren't supported

timeline.message: DevMojo invoking other goals should filter out plugin params that aren't supported

timeline.bodyText: Is there any value in lazy loading the supportedParams? Looks like unneeded complexity to me but maybe I miss something?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Not much value. E.g. in case the configuration elements are present but empty.
replies.author: aloubyansky
